NATIONAL ASSOCIATION OF EDUCATIONAL BROADCASTERS
OFFICE OF THE PRESIDENT
Box 2002
University, Alabama
February 11, 19$h
Mr. Frank E. Schooley
Station WILL
University of Illinois
Urbana, Illinois
Dear Frank:
Please see the attached copy of correspondence with Justin
Miller, copies of which I have sent to all members of the Program
Development Committee and the Executive Committee.
After conferring with Skornia and members of your committee,
please make a recommendation to the Executive Committee on this.
I doubt that we will want to produce a series on VGA ourselves,
however, if you and the committee think this is a good thing, write
Miller for more details, by all means hit him up for a slug of money
for production, and proceed. Whatever you do, I would suggest that
you send Miller a brief note stating that you are taking this up
with the committee and will give him a reaction in the near future.
Kindest regards.
Grayaon Ausmus
President
GA/sbr
